member.name: T:Xfinium.Pdf.Rendering.PdfPageImageFormat
member.summary: Specifies the supported formats for saving the page image.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Rendering.PdfPageImageFormat.Tiff
member.summary: The image is saved in TIFF format. B/W images are compressed using CCITT G4, color images are uncompressed.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Rendering.PdfPageImageFormat.TiffZipCompressed
member.summary: The image is saved in TIFF format usinng Zip compression. Applies only to color images.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Rendering.PdfPageImageFormat.TiffLzwCompressed
member.summary: The image is saved in TIFF format usinng LZW compression. Applies only to color images.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Rendering.PdfPageImageFormat.Png
member.summary: The image is saved in PNG format.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Rendering.PdfPageImageFormat.Raw
member.summary: The image is saved in RAW format. The byte order is specified by the rendering surface.

member.name: T:Xfinium.Pdf.Rendering.PdfRenderingErrorHandling
member.summary: Specifies how the errors during page rendering should be handled.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Rendering.PdfRenderingErrorHandling.ThrowException
member.summary: An exception is thrown if the page content has errors.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Rendering.PdfRenderingErrorHandling.ThrowExceptionForAnyErrors
member.summary: An exception is thrown if there are any PDF errors.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Rendering.PdfRenderingErrorHandling.IgnorePageContentErrors
member.summary: Page content errors are ignored and the page is rendered till the first invalid token is encountered.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Rendering.PdfRenderingErrorHandling.IgnoreAllErrors
member.summary: PDF errors are ignored and the page is rendered till the first PDF error is encountered.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Rendering.PdfRenderingErrorHandling.IgnorePageContentErrorsAndContinue
member.summary: Page content errors are ignored and the page is rendered, skipping the found invalid tokens.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Rendering.PdfRenderingErrorHandling.IgnoreAllErrorsAndContinue
member.summary: PDF errors are ignored and the page is rendered, skipping the encountered PDF errors.

member.name: T:Xfinium.Pdf.Rendering.PdfRenderingErrorType
member.summary: Specifies the supported error types for reporting.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Rendering.PdfRenderingErrorType.GenericError
member.summary: Generic PDF error.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Rendering.PdfRenderingErrorType.MissingObject
member.summary: Object is missing.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Rendering.PdfRenderingErrorType.InvalidObjectType
member.summary: The type of an object is not of the expected type.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Rendering.PdfRenderingErrorType.InvalidPageContentToken
member.summary: Page content contains an invalid token.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Rendering.PdfRenderingErrorType.InvalidPageContentOperator
member.summary: Page content contains a PDF operator with invalid parameters.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Rendering.PdfRenderingErrorType.TooManyGraphicsStateRestores
member.summary: Page content contains too many Q operators.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Rendering.PdfRenderingErrorType.MissingImageData
member.summary: Image object has no data.

member.name: F:Xfinium.Pdf.Rendering.PdfRenderingErrorType.InsufficientImageData
member.summary: Image data is incomplete.
